Yuri

Chae Ri Na

Introduction

Girl Friends (Korean: 걸 프렌즈; Japanese: ガールフレンズ) was a female duo signed with Doremi Media. They released their first studio album, “Another Myself”, on July 26, 2006. Due to inactivity, they were presumed disbanded in 2008.
